thread.title: Arsene Wenger: Arsenal could be without Aaron Ramsey for up to a month - News Shopper
thread.title_full: Arsene Wenger: Arsenal could be without Aaron Ramsey for up to a month - News Shopper - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: News Shopper
title: Arsene Wenger: Arsenal could be without Aaron Ramsey for up to a month - News Shopper
text:
Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has revealed midfielder Aaron Ramsey could be out for up to a month because of a hamstring injury. Wenger also suggested playing for Wales against Andorra could have contributed to the injury and predicted Ramsey would miss the friendly international with Holland on November 13. Wenger told the Arsenal website: " He had a scan today but he's out.
 News Shopper.
